snippet: After Hurricane Sandy knocked out power in the Northeast, a New York start-up came up with a good publicity stunt: light a fire so people could charge their dead cellphones.
abstract: After Hurricane Sandy knocked out power in the Northeast, a New York start-up came up with a good publicity stunt: light a fire so people could charge their dead cellphones.

headline.main: Dead Phone Battery? Just Burn Something.
headline.print_headline: Firing Up a Dead Cellphone, While Cooking Dinner
